name: Whale Out
description:
Play as a virus inside a small fish who wants to reach the surface. Only as a whale will he prevail!

Get eaten by progressively bigger fish to surpass the water pressure and reach new heights, but watch out for squids, sharks and blue fishes, for there will render all efforts meaningless and end you.

Death is not the end, because the virus move from host to host as you get eaten.

Your goal is to level up, literally, as you move up to the surface and you get bigger and bigger when you get eaten.

Inputs:

Space bar: Dash

WASD: Movement

Les 3D models utilisés pour ce jeu ont été trouvé en ligne.
